```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
f <- file.choose()
f
student <- read_csv(f)
```

```{r}
student
```

```{r}
ggplot(student, aes(x=ReligImp, y=StudyHrs)) + geom_boxplot()
```

bootstrap per other

```{r}
student %>% nest(-ReligImp) %>% 
  mutate(samp=map(data, ~rerun(10, sample(.$StudyHrs, replace = T)))) 
%>% 
  mutate(means=map(samp, ~map_dbl(., ~mean(.x)))) %>% 
  unnest(means) 
%>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=means)) + geom_histogram(bins=30) + 
  facet_wrap(~degree)
```
